Member Function Documentation

int cma::CMA_ME_Analyzer::runWithSentence ( Sentence &  sentence  )  [virtual]

Execute the morphological analysis based on a sentence.

Parameters:
sentence an instance of Sentence
Returns:
0 for fail, 1 for success
Precondition:
the raw sentence string could be got by sentence.getString().
Postcondition:
on successful return, the n-best results could be got by sentence.getListSize(), etc.
Attention:
white-space characters are ignored in the analysis, which include " \t\n\v\f\r", and also space character in specific encoding.

Implements cma::Analyzer.

References cma::Sentence::addList(), cma::Sentence::getListSize(), cma::Sentence::getMorphemeList(), cma::Analyzer::getOption(), cma::CMA_ME_Knowledge::getPOSTable(), cma::Sentence::getScore(), cma::Sentence::getString(), cma::CMA_ME_Knowledge::isStopWord(), cma::Morpheme::lexicon_, cma::Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST, cma::Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_TAGGING, cma::Morpheme::posCode_, cma::Morpheme::posStr_, and cma::Sentence::setScore().

int cma::CMA_ME_Analyzer::runWithStream ( const char *  inFileName,
const char *  outFileName 
) [virtual]

Execute the morphological analysis based on a file.

Parameters:
inFileName input file name
outFileName output file name
Returns:
0 for fail, 1 for success
Postcondition:
on successful return, the one-best result is printed to file outFileName.

Implements cma::Analyzer.

Execute the morphological analysis based on a paragraph string.

Parameters:

Returns:

void cma::CMA_ME_Analyzer::splitSentence ( const char *  paragraph,
std::vector< Sentence > &  sentences 
) [virtual]

Split a paragraph string into sentences.

Parameters:
paragraph paragraph string
sentences sentence vector
Attention:
the original elements in sentences would not be removed, and the splited sentences are appended into sentences.

Implements cma::Analyzer.
